topic.title: Getting Started with HP Cloud OS Telemetry and Reporting (Ceilometer) Service

section.title: Using the API to access Eve
section.p: You can use a low-level, raw REST API access to HP Cloud OS Telemetry and Reporting service. See .

section.title: Using the CLI
section.p: You can use any of several command-line interface software to access HP Cloud OS Telemetry and Reporting service. See .

section.title: Using language bindings
section.p: You can use any of several language bindings to access HP Cloud OS Telemetry and Reporting service. See .

section.title: For more information
section.p: Also see the Help topics that are available in the Operational Dashboard and Administration Dashboard. Website copies are available:

li.xref: HP Cloud OS Operational Dashboard Help
HP Cloud OS Administration Dashboard Help
